title: Good Morning, Night
writer: Anna Laura Braghetti (book), Paola Tavella (book), Marco Bellocchio (screenplay), Daniela Ceselli (screenplay)
actors: Maya Sansa, Luigi Lo Cascio, Roberto Herlitzka, Paolo Briguglia
plot: The 1978 kidnapping of politician Aldo Moro as seen from the perspective of one of his assailants: a conflicted young woman in the ranks of the Red Brigade.
